info.title: HF API
info.description:
OpenAPI specification for the Hack Forums API.

Requires access token obtained via HF API Developer Portal to use 'Try it out' functionality.

_seller.description: Search directly by Seller User ID(s). Optional _page & _perpage parameters.

_buyer.description: Search directly by Buyer User ID(s). Optional _page & _perpage parameters.

_pid.description: Post ID to link donation to.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

post.summary: Returns all available, provided read fields.
post.description: Returns all available, provided read fields.

all.summary: Return summary data for various endpoints.

post.summary: Returns information for the current user.
post.description: Returns information for the current user.

usernameUsergroup.summary: return current user's uid, username, and usergroup

allInformation.summary: return all available data for current user

post.summary: Returns information for provided signature market(s) type market.
post.description: Returns information for provided signature market(s) type market.

post.summary: Returns information for provided signature market(s) type order.
post.description: Returns information for provided signature market(s) type order.

loungeThreads.summary: return recent posts in Lounge "Search posts by Forum ID(s)."

post.summary: Write information to a provided thread.
post.description: Write information to a provided thread.

testApiPost.summary: post on the HF API test thread

posts._message: Using the [url=https://github.com/xadamxk/hf-api-specification]hf-api-specification[/url] project to post on the HF API test thread.

testApiThread.summary: Create a test thread in the HF API section.

threads._message: Using the [url=https://github.com/xadamxk/hf-api-specification]hf-api-specification[/url] project to create a HF API test thread.

bytes._reason: Using the hf-api-specification project (https://github.com/xadamxk/hf-api-specification) to send xadamxk bytes.

post.summary: Deposit specified bytes to API Client Vault (Minimum 100).
post.description: Deposit specified bytes to API Client Vault (Minimum 100).

post.summary: Withdraw specified bytes to API Client Vault. (Minimum 100)
post.description: Withdraw specified bytes to API Client Vault. (Minimum 100)

post.summary: Bump specified thread using Stanley Byte Bump feature (100 bytes).
post.description: Bump specified thread using Stanley Byte Bump feature (100 bytes).
